uid.description: A unique identifier for the app assignment record

created_at.description: Timestamp when the app assignment was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the app assignment was last updated

assignee_type.description: The type of entity this app is assigned to

assignee_uid.description: The uid of the entity this app is assigned to

app_code_name.description: The unique identifier of the app

is_internal.description: App does not show in the app market but still available to use in all relevant integration points

pre_installed.description: Define the app as pre-installed for all new accounts, app shows in app market as installed on first appearance. The user will be able to uninstall it later if they wish to. This is relevant only to account with platform app market

description: An app assignment entity that defines the relationship between an app and any type of entity (business, package, or directory), including installation and visibility settings
